```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(latsabber)
library(hrbrthemes)

plotdata <- asbmb_pubs %>%
  filter(url_type == "DOI") %>%
  mutate(
    doi = tolower(str_remove(link_url, "^^.*?(?=\\d)")),
    date = lubridate::date(created.date)
    ) %>%
  left_join(citations, by = "doi") %>%
  mutate(
    times_cited = replace_na(times_cited, 0)
    )
```
